arts.ttl: Woltemade's late strike helps VfB Stuttgart sink nine-man St. Pauli
arts.sum: Eager to ensure their Bundesliga survival at the Millerntor, St. Pauli were left frustrated after a goal from Stuttgart's Nick Woltemade two minutes before injury time left the nine-man hosts looking to their remaining games to guarantee their top-flight status. Woltemade came closest for Stuttgart, forcing a fine save from Vasilj in the 18th minute.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Hosts look to secure survival
arts.sum: St Pauli could secure their Bundesliga survival on Saturday at Millerntor-Stadion, but they will need to avoid defeat against Stuttgart to have a chance.
